medical_history.chief_complaint: Transient global aphasia and chronic major depression.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Acute onset of incoherent speech, confusion, inattention, and strange behavior. Symptoms resolved over 36 hours.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of severe major depression requiring electroconvulsive therapy; treated for pulmonary embolus two years prior during ankle fracture recovery.
medical_history.social_history: Currently on trazodone therapy with regular psychiatric follow-up; occupation as a taxicab driver.
